description: The ruthless double fisting action continues, this time with greedy bottoms Mason Garet and Evan Matthews on their backs while Matthieu Paris shoves a fist up both men's asses. Filthy fist-pig Paris pummels the holes with such enthusiasm he doesn't even stop to take a piss, releasing a hot stream all over the warehouse floor. Matthews' gaping cave and giant rosebud demand tag-team fisting action. You won't believe your eyes when Paris shoves his ENTIRE arm, to the elbow, up inside Matthews canal. Shockingly, Garet pounds on the backside of Paris' arm to force it even deeper! According to the crew on set, after this mind-boggling scene Paris turned to Matthews and pronounced him the King of Fisting!
title: Handy Men
